ygData.subject: Quest to kill Paladin.
ygData.msgSnippet: There is one quest for Dark Elves in Lodge of the Dead where this guy want s you to kill a Paladin names Sir Lindeal in Lavastorm. Well I have looked all over
ygData.messageBody:
There is one quest for Dark Elves in Lodge of the Dead where this guy
want's you to kill a Paladin names Sir Lindeal in Lavastorm. Well I
have looked all over for this guy and I cannot find him. Does anyone
know his location or where he spawns? I've heard rumors that he will
only spawn when there are people camping the Shadowed men, is this
true? man, I really really can't find this guy and I have been all
over Lavastorm! Some help please!
Another thing, do you have to do this quest before you do Reaper of
the Dead quest? I know the same guy gives out both of these.



~Daikun To'Biath
Shadow Knight and loyal servant of Innoruuk.
